channel.title: Can't read any OBDII data
channel.description:
I have an electron connected to my carloop. I'm not able to read any CAN data. The red LED lights up when I have it connected to the OBDII port, and I can connect to the the electron, but it doesn't seem to read any data from any of my cars. I tried the example VIN reader app, and it couldn't even do that. I upgraded the device OS from 0.5.4 to 1.1.0
Any ideas?

item.title: Can't read any OBDII data
item.dc:creator: chanson
item.description:
Vehicle info: Tried on my 2009 Acura TSX and my 2005 Jeep Wrangler. No go.

Read full topic
